tool_description: Get main article content and meta data from news articles or blog entries.

api_list.name: POST /article/parse
api_list.description: Extract main article and meta data from a news entry or blog post.

api_list.name: GET /article/parse
api_list.description: Extract main article and meta data from a news entry or blog post.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the article to be parsed.

optional_parameters.name: word_per_minute
optional_parameters.description: Reading speed in words per minute.

optional_parameters.name: desc_truncate_len
optional_parameters.description: Maximum length of the description to return.

optional_parameters.name: desc_len_min
optional_parameters.description: Minimum length of the description to return.

optional_parameters.name: content_len_min
optional_parameters.description: Minimum length of the content to return.
